title: Drawing, "Landscape in Colombia, "Joche"", July 1853
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, with numbers at various locations; again at center:  rock / water; again, at lower center:  Toche  July -53- ; and again at bottom right:  2 splendid dazzing purple flowers / 3 white flowers;
description: Horizontal view of a road, climbing toward the background, at the left bank of a valley through which a stream flows, wooded hills are seen and at left the roofs of two houses are visible.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Landscape in Colombia, "Joche"", July 1853.
July 1853. Graphite on grayish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-89.
